final_answer: The humor in this image arises from the contrast between simplicity and complexity. On the left, a single remote easily controls the TV, depicted with the word "YES." This illustrates the ideal, straightforward setup. On the right, however, a stick figure looks confused and overwhelmed by many remotes, matched with the word "BUT." This highlights the chaotic reality many people face with an overabundance of remotes and options. The humor lies in the relatable discrepancy between wanting simplicity and dealing with complexity.
